data.description:
Sanctuary Folk Art ( Reb and Carmel and all) will be leaving our location at 140 South Division after 18 years of business in Heartside.

Come see us and invest in one last piece of art from this legacy location.

Please visit and say "Happy Trails" before our October 31 , 2017 exit.

Thanks to all of Grand Rapids and beyond for a memorable run.
data.name: Happy Trails Sale

data.description:
Grand Rapids Legend Reb Roberts teams up with Andrew Hawks for an art show and live collaboration.

This show will be immediately followed by Calder City Development Corp & Those Guys Painting Company present : Foundation.  (Follow link for more info)

https://www.facebook.com/events/1069949626474080/?ref=br_rs
data.name: Reb Roberts ::: Andrew Hawks ::: Art Show ::: Live Collab

data.description: Sanctuary Folk Art Gallery presents the 5th annual Outsiders Art Fair. Located at the center of the universe, featuring local talent, art, pop, folk. $5 admission.

data.description: Reuben has created an incredidle mix of functional and purely   beautiful artistic woodworks. Furniture, boxes to keep your treasures in and multi-dimensional wall pieces.                                                      Artist reception   Sat.   Dec.12      5-8 PM
data.name: Reuben VanTil Woodworking Artist/Craftsman Extraordinaire

data.description: Henry Brown is by far West Michigan's most extraordinary collage artist. Every creation by Henry is a visual story full of history, nostalgia and pop eccentricities.
data.name: St. Patrick's Day w/ New Collage Work By Henry Brown

data.description: Come get your chocolate and art lovers fix on, all at the same time. Soar into Sanctuary Folk Art on your LOVE ROCKET for a sweet blast.
data.name: Eat Chocolate--Love The Art

data.description: Black Friday sale at Sanctuary Gallery with great prices on new outsider, contemporary folk and fine art work from many of the Sanctuary artists.
